work.title: Teacher at Maya Acosta
work.description: I helped this content creator by practising specific vocabulary, reviewing notions about argumentation in Spanish, and correcting texts and publications for her site and her company.

work.title: Translator at Radioascolta
work.description: I helped this radio station with a song in Spanish. I mostly corrected pronuntiation issues, grammar, and ortography. I did it both through private lessons and by creating videos in which I explained the mistakes and gave advice to work on them.

work.title: Private Tutoring at Sfumature makeup & BEAUTY
work.description: This +100K youtuber wanted to enter into the Spanish speaking content market. I helped her both with private lessons and video translation. In the lessons, I taught her Spanish grammar and pronuntiation, as well as we corrected her own translations.
